name: terra-aggregate-translations
description: The terra-aggregate-translations pre-build tool assists with creating the translation, intl loader and translation loader files that are configured for the specified locales. This tool is offered as a CLI script and as a setup function.
author: Cerner Corporation

scripts.clean:install: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m 'Released version %s' && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m 'Released version %s' && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m 'Released version %s' && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run jest
